short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy text effortlessly from any website with Swift Copy Snap.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Swift Copy Snap makes copying text from any website easy. This lightweight extension simplifies your workflow by allowing you to effortlessly copy text. Just click the extension on pages that block right-click and copy-paste.

Important Notice:
Swift Copy Snap is designed to improve your browsing, but it may change how some pages work. If you encounter issues, simply turn off the extension.

Unlock the ability to copy text and use the right-click function on websites that may have disabled them.

How to Use:
- Simply click on the browser action icon to activate the 'copy mode' for the current site.

Key Features:
- Easily copy text.
- Remember your preferred settings for each site, so you don't have to do it again next time.
